subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored his first goal of the tournament as the Canadian men won their second consecutive Olympic title. Canada defended its title in men’s hockey with a 3-0 victory over Sweden on Sunday.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored his first goal of the tournament as the Canadian men won their second consecutive Olympic title. Canada defended its title in men’s hockey with a 3-0 victory over Sweden on Sunday.
